Jose.src.objects

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jose.src.objects.Platform

  • public class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a movable platform that can carry the player on itself.
    Author:
    Dzejrou

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.newdawn.slick.Image block
      Image of one block in the plarform.
      protected int block_count
      Number of blocks that the platform consists of.
      protected int block_height
      Dimensions of one block.
      protected int block_width
      Dimensions of one block.
      protected int max_step_count
      Maximum amount of steps before this platform dissapears.
      protected float speed_x
      Speed of the platform when moving.
      protected float speed_y
      Speed of the platform when moving.
      protected float start_x
      Coordinates of the top left corner of the platform.
      protected float start_y
      Coordinates of the top left corner of the platform.
      protected int step_count
      Keeps track of the number of steps this platform has taken.
      protected View view
      Reference to the game's view.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Draws the platform (all blocks).
      org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle get_bounds()
      Returns the collision hitbox of this platform.
      org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle get_carry_bounds()
      Returns a rectangle which when stood on carries the player with the platform.
      float speed_x()
      Returns the horizontal speed, used to carry the player.
      float speed_y()
      Returns the vertical speed, used to carry the player.
      void update()
      Updates the platform (movement).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Platform

        public Platform(float pos_x,
                float pos_y,
                int count,
                View v,
                int max,
                java.lang.String mode)
        Constructor, sets all necessary attributes and loads the sprite image.
        Parameters:
        pos_x - Starting X axis coordinate.
        pos_y - Starting Y axis coordinate.
        count - Number of blocks that create the platform.
        v - Reference to the game's view.
        max - Maximum number of steps before direction change.
        mode - Mode of movement - vertical/horizontal.
